Pre-Game Insights: Sacramento comes into a matchup against Miami as winners of four straight games.
The Kings are 9-12 on their home court, while the Heat are 7-9 on the road.
Sacramento is 9-6 in games decided by at least 10 points, and Miami has a 9-6 record in such games.
The Kings shoot 47.7% from the field, while the Heat allow 46.5% to opponents.
The Heat average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game, while the Kings give up fewer makes.
Others: Heat: Dru Smith is out for the season (achilles), Haywood Highsmith is day-to-day (personal), and Josh Richardson is day-to-day (heel).
